answers.answer: I'm asking my doctor Wednesday if she will induce me when I hit 37weeks (I'm 34+4) may I ask why your being induced?
If I don't have baby by Friday I'm getting induced that Monday at 40+2
Yes may.I ask why too?.I have eye.blood.pressure.and.I think.im.on the same boat

Awwww hope all goes well ladies n I have a bad bone condition called spd had it really bad in this pregnancy to the point were I can't hardly move so doctors agreed for me to be induced at 37 weeks as im full term then :) I have to admit im so glad because the pain is horrible and it's caused so many problems like getting around getting in n out of bath or shower moving in bed n getting out of bed etc xx

Thanks for sharing congrats and good luck!!! My husband is out of town a lot for work and we never know when he will be called out and when he will be home but if I can get her to induce me then he can tell his boss he needs to be home
No problem hun best of luck to you :) xx
I had high blood pressure as well, but didn't get induced until 41 wks. I don't know if they will unless it's preeclampsia. Depends on your doctor I guess

question: So excited to meet my baby girl :') anyone else being induced? Xx
title: yay made it to 37 weeks getting induced tomorrow
